content.description: Students design an experiment to find the work function of a sample of metal. Both ultraviolet light and visible light are incident on the metal in separate trials, and both result in the emission of electrons from the metal. The maximum kinetic energy of electrons ejected by the ultraviolet light is <math alttext="K sub ultraviolet" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub></math> and the maximum kinetic energy of electrons ejected by the visible light is <math alttext="K sub visible" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>K</mi> <mtext>vis</mtext> </msub> </math>.
content.question: Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="K sub ultraviolet" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub></math> to <math alttext="K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math> and provides a valid justification?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub ultraviolet, is less than K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math>, because the wavelength of the ultraviolet light is less than that of the visible light.

<math alttext="K sub ultraviolet, is less than K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math>, because the energy of the ultraviolet photons is less than that of the visible light photons.

<math alttext="K sub ultraviolet, is greater than K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math>, because the energy of the ultraviolet photons is greater than that of the visible light photons.

<math alttext="K sub ultraviolet, is greater than K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math>, because the wavelength of the ultraviolet photons is greater than that of the visible light photons.

content.answer: <math alttext="K sub ultraviolet, is greater than K sub visible" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>uv</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>vis</mtext></msub></math>, because the energy of the ultraviolet photons is greater than that of the visible light photons.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
